availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Joseph E. Gardiner, Sr. (Nelson County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Nelson County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Thedore Gardiner and Elizabeth Gardiner. Married to Martha J. Gardiner. Father of C. Rapier Gardiner, Ida L. Gardiner, William Gardiner, Arabella Gardiner, and Joseph E. Gardiner, Jr. Farmer in Nelson County in 1850. Resident in Nelson County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nelson County, District 1, p. 292B.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nelson County, Precinct 10, p. 139B.
Find A Grave, "Joseph Edward Gardiner Sr. (17 Jun 1823-22 Nov 1889)," Memorial #6074248, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/6074248 (accessed August 13, 2020).
